data.name: ClockAddSuccess
data.value: The clock has been added! Please allow up to one minute for the clock to update.

data.name: ClockRemoveSuccess
data.value: The clock has been removed!

data.name: CommandAssemblyReloadSuccess
data.value: Command assembly reloaded!

data.name: CommandPrefixUpdateSuccess
data.value: Command prefix updated!

data.name: DBUserCountInProgress
data.value: Counting all entities in the User database, please wait...

data.name: DiscordNicknameTooLongError
data.value: Because of Discord's limitations, nicknames must be 32 characters or fewer in length.

data.name: GenericFailure
data.value: Task failed!

data.name: GenericSuccess
data.value: Task completed!

data.name: IncompatiblePresetError
data.value: The Preset provided is not compatible with the operation requested.

data.name: InvalidNumberError
data.value: That's not a valid number!

data.name: InvalidRegexError
data.value: That's not a valid regex string!

data.name: LodestoneBAAchievementSuccess
data.value: The achievement has been found, and you have been given the Arsenal Master role.

data.name: LodestoneBAMountSuccess
data.value: The mount has been found, and you have been given the Cleared role.

data.name: LodestoneDiscordIdNotFoundError
data.value: Discord ID not found. Please ensure your Discord ID is located somewhere in your Lodestone bio.

data.name: LodestoneMountAchievementNotFoundError
data.value: The mount or achievement was not found. Please ensure your achievements and mounts are public for this operation.

data.name: LogDirectory
data.value: logs

data.name: MemberAlreadyHasRoleError
data.value: You already have all roles associated with this command!

data.name: MentionNotProvidedError
data.value: Please provide a user mention in your command.

data.name: MustBeUsedInGuildError
data.value: That command must be used in a guild!

data.name: MustBeUsedOnVoiceChannelError
data.value: That argument must reference a voice channel, not a text channel!

data.name: NotATimezoneIdError
data.value: That is not a valid timezone ID!

data.name: RegexNotFoundError
data.value: The specified regular expression was not found in the database.

data.name: ReportInGuildWarning
data.value: in the future, please only use the report command in my DMs. Though your report is being processed, using my DM to make the report helps maintain everyone's privacy. Thank you ^^

data.name: ReportThankYou
data.value: Thank you for your report. The moderators will read it as soon as they are available.

data.name: SerilogFilename
data.value: log.log

data.name: UndefinedPresetError
data.value: Preset Undefined enables all commands, without enabling the corresponding services.\nThis configuration is prohibited.

data.name: UnsavedMessageAttachmentsWarning
data.value: Unsaved message attachments linked below. Please be aware that attempting to access deleted files may return 403 Forbidden from the CDN.

data.name: UserNotFoundError
data.value: No user matching the query could be found.

data.name: UserNotInDatabaseError
data.value: That user was not found in the database.

data.name: VerificationProcess1
data.value: You have begun the verification process. Your **Discord account ID** is `

data.name: VerificationProcess2
data.value: `. Please add this somewhere in your FFXIV Lodestone account description. You can edit your account description here: https://na.finalfantasyxiv.com/lodestone/my/setting/profile/ After you have put your Discord account ID in your Lodestone profile, please use

data.name: VerificationProcess3
data.value: verify `Lodestone ID` to tell me your Lodestone ID **(located in your character profile URL)**.
